dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S57 IS: Making Agricultural Products Locally Essential Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Welch (for himself, Ms. Collins, Mr. Schumer, Mr. Sanders, Mr. King, and Mrs. Gillibrand) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to include maple syrup under the seniors farmers’ market nutrition program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Making Agricultural Products Locally Essential Act or the MAPLE Act.

section.header: Maple syrup under the seniors farmers’ market nutrition program
section.text: Section 4402(b)(1) of the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 (7 U.S.C. 3007(b)(1)) is amended by inserting maple syrup, before and herbs.
